about_the_game:
About this demo

  • This demo showcases the first of five chapters.

  • We’re aiming to have the full game ready by the end of February.

  • Your feedback is invaluable to us, so please share your thoughts!

  • If you enjoy the demo, consider adding it to your wishlist.

YOUR HOUSE is a unique, text-driven mystery game that blends immersive reading with interactive puzzles, pulling players into a gripping thriller. Set in the 1990s, it follows Debbie, a rebellious teenager on a mission to uncover the secrets of a mysterious mansion.

On Debbie’s 18th birthday, her life falls apart—expelled from school, betrayed by her boyfriend and best friend, and hit by a car. At midnight, she finds an envelope on her bed with a cryptic postcard, an address, and a key. With nothing left to lose, she escapes the dorm, steals a motorcycle, and heads to the mysterious house. As she explores, unsettling questions arise: Who sent the letter? Is it a gift or a cruel joke? The deeper she delves, the more the lines between truth and mystery blur, leading her into a dark, life-altering discovery. 

YOUR HOUSE is more than just a building—it’s a living puzzle that weaves together the stories of a lost teenager seeking answers and a wise woman fighting against societal expectations to embrace her true self. As their paths intersect, a powerful and unexpected conclusion reshapes both their lives. With hidden doors, secret rooms, mysterious objects, and underground passages to explore, players must read and solve intricate puzzles to unlock the house’s deepest secrets and uncover the truth it conceals.

  • Text as Gameplay: Progress through a gripping five-chapter thriller by reading and solving intricate puzzles.

  • Inspired by a True Story: Based on a real-life Manhattan apartment designed by architect Eric Clough, YOUR HOUSE conceals a hidden mystery rooted in reality.

  • Striking Aesthetics: YOUR HOUSE features a noir comic visual style that captivates and enhances the mysterious atmosphere.

  • Seamlessly Integrated Puzzles: Experience challenging, escape room-style puzzles that blend effortlessly with the narrative, adding depth without disrupting the story flow.

  • Immersive Storytelling: YOUR HOUSE merges the worlds of games and literature, pushing the boundaries of both mediums to deliver a unique and engaging narrative experience.

  • A Prequel: YOUR HOUSE serves as the prequel to our debut game, UNMEMORY.
